actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 13 of title 44, United States Code, to provide that certain proceedings of the Italian American War Veterans of the United States, Inc., shall be printed as a House document, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides that specific proceedings of the Italian American War Veterans of the United States, Incorporated, shall be printed annually as a House of Representatives document. (Amends 44 U.S.C. 1332)

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 13 of title 44, United States Code, to provide that certain proceedings of the Italian American War Veterans of the United States, Inc., shall be printed as a House document, and for other purposes.
